PerformanceToJSON.summary: The toJSON() method of the interface is a {{Glossary("Serialization","serializer")}}; it returns a JSON representation of the object.
PerformanceToJSON.returns:
A {{jsxref("JSON")}} object that is the serialization of the object.The returned JSON doesn't contain the property because it is of type , which doesn't provide a toJSON() operation.
NOTENote: The JSON object contains the serialization of the deprecated and properties. To get a JSON representation of the newer interface, call instead.
